longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of Lithuania must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued to nationals of Lithuania; 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Lithuania will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Lithuania are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Passports must be signed by the holder
